website_summaries.verdict: These shoes are more for casual wear. If you are looking for a performance skate shoe, check out other options on our shortlist.
pros: Stands out for its high-quality canvas uppers which hold up well over time
The simple yet classic design is a favorite among the skater community
cons: For those with very sensitive skin, the back of the shoe can cause blisters

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves VANS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter because she loves Vans. I have bought her boots, cute sandals, flats and all kinds of inbetweens. She is 13 years old and with a closet full of options, she will only wear VANS!! I finally decided to just let her wear her style, so I got a her a few different colors, and she really loves these. Her favorite are the blue and black ones, but she loves these too! They fit as expected and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: JakeRiley

customer_reviews.title: 9.5 Woman’s fit great
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t like sneakers, but I wanted a comfortable shoe. So, I thought I’d try these because I really like the look. I never tried a shoe like this before because I thought they would be too flat. I saw someone’s comment about adding inserts. I ordered some along with the shoes and voila - a fun supportive casual shoe. I might get more colors! I’m a regular 9.5 woman’s, and these fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jamesd

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about the authenticity of the shoes. But sure enough they are vans, I got the all white ones and they came brand new tags still on them. Was shipped extremely fast, a week sooner then I was expecting. And they are true to size. If you want to buy vans and not go to the store to buy vans. These are the ones to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality,  not sure if they're genuine.
customer_reviews.text: They fall apart within a week. I have bought three pairs, one was a straight upknock off, and had cardboard in the heel pads. The other two fell apart, the outer rim disconnected from the shoe. I love the look, but hate the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anjela

customer_reviews.title: All-Around Great Casual Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, excellent fit. Will match all casual outfits. I was pleasantly surprised how soft the insoles are. They remind me of the old school canvas shoes, which I always expect to have almost no padding... but these shoes are much more comfortable and well made, without making the foot look bulky.
customer_reviews.author: ErWin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They're absolutely perfect. Geniune vans. They fit perfectly, and the white ones I ordered are actually white which I'm extremely excited about because sometimes I see 'white vans' come off white.
customer_reviews.author: Havilah

customer_reviews.title: Van's are always consistant in quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: I need shoes with thick soles, due to walking on large gravel rocks daily, I have tried many brands, and the bottoms of my feet continued to be sore by the end of the day, however VAN's have been the only ones that hold up to that kind of traffic without compromising comfort. The load seems to be distributed equally throughout the sole and never makes my feet sore. Good product, Thanks
customer_reviews.author: C Myers

customer_reviews.title: Always the perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Honestly... you can never go wrong with a pair of vans! Same exact thing you'd get from the Vans Store, but it shows up to your doorstep and you don't even have to leave the house- hehe
customer_reviews.author: Just your average guy

customer_reviews.title: Great grip
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes! The grip on the bottom makes walking so easy. I’ve only bought and one black pair and hope to buy more. These shoes go with plenty of outfits why not buy a second pair?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my daughter and she loved them. Perfect fit and the right color and style that I ordered. I was so scared I would get a different shoe. I will do more business with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used selling for price of brand new
customer_reviews.text: Got my shoes today and there’s a lovely grass stain on the toe. Thanks for trying to sell these with a. Brand new price for used stuff. DONT WASTE YOUR TIME THIS IS GARBAGE
customer_reviews.author: Sydni

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: MY FAVORITE SHOE! Super cute and laid back. They go with pretty much anything and they are beyond comfortable. I have a pretty wide foot so it’s hard for me to find shoes that don’t make my fee go numb. I will forever own a pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: amanda young

customer_reviews.title: Caution: Heavy load
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were a little tight near my pinky toes. They are also kind of heavy. Much heavier than any other pair of sneakers I've owned, perhaps with the exception of platform sneakers in the mid-90s. I wore them to a music festival and they turned out to be a lot of trouble. For everyday wear they're alright. Also the rubber base breaks away from the fabric pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: YesimstillListening

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in october. Wore them here and there a few times. Began wearing them frequently in January. It's now early March and they have holes forming on the top above my toes. I am NOT rough on shoes whatsoever and I hate wearing shoes so I wear them from point a to point b and take them off right away. I like them so I'm a little bummed about these holes:(
customer_reviews.author: Monica Patton

customer_reviews.title: Returned item
customer_reviews.text: Brought as a birthday gift. Intended party bought for themself so I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes in the world!
customer_reviews.text: I just got back from a tour in South America (Brazil, Argentina and Chile) and i got these shoes to walk around in those cities and I can’t wait to receive now the white ones. They were extremely comfortable and looked perfect with everything. I won’t take them off ever.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Elena Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. She's 11 years old and I got her size 6. Sits perfect and looks sharp
customer_reviews.author: Yifat

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughter and she's an 8 most of the time but because Vans tend to be slightly narrow in toe area 8 1/2 was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: If you're feet are slightly wide, you might want to go a half size up. Bought for my daughter and she's an 8 most of the time but because Vans tend to be slightly narrow in toe area 8 1/2 was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and classic
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are so cute! they can go with so may different outfits which i love. they do get dirty quick (i mean it’s white so...). comfortable, though i would recommend breaking them in before you walk 5 miles a day in them on vacation 😅
customer_reviews.author: Mariah G

customer_reviews.title: Love my vans
customer_reviews.text: I love this color. I'm a pretty neutral color gal and I can wear these with literally anything!
customer_reviews.author: Karla K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten sooo many compliments on these shoes. They're comfy, and they can go with a lot of different outfits. I actually have another pair that have lasted me for years. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son - the shoes look great on him and are true to size. Definitely worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: canvas not leather
customer_reviews.text: My feet are hot & sneakers with leather or vinnal make my feet sweat & then I have issues. These appear to be like ones I bought for years till they were discontinued. I have not worn them yet for my 10 hour work day on my feel yet but will this spring.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Different colors
customer_reviews.text: All was great with the fit bit these shoes came in two different blues.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Clark

customer_reviews.title: Classic design
customer_reviews.text: They will wear out if your feet are like mine in the heel and just behind the toes. But they will last a while and are functional.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Michael Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased with my last pair of Van's I knew I needed another. These are very similar, look great and fit perfectly. The only drawback is I keep finding them on my granddaughter's feet!
customer_reviews.author: JustJoy

customer_reviews.title: Poor form.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Vans in size 9.5, and I got a size 10, made in China knock off. Poor form.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I discovered them when shopping for my grandson's shoes; and liked them for me and him. I bought us both a pair. I was concerned about comfort because they appear not to have good arch support. So far they are very comfortable and fit well and true to my size. I'm going to get some others in different colors. Good bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: True to size.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter, and she loves them. The size is perfect too. She has very sensitive feet, but with a pair of invisible socks, she says they are quite comfortable. These are the only shoes she’s worn to school since we received them early last week, and they look great with her school uniform. I’m very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marazcona

customer_reviews.title: Perfect white canvas shoes
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fit perfectly! I have narrow feet size 6.5 and these were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Heather T

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be aware
customer_reviews.text: Not sure these are real, the shoes have two different colored labels one with white writing one with black. I wore them once and won't wear again because I am embrassed that they may be fake
customer_reviews.author: cocopuffs

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Was the wrong size shoe, men's 6 instead of women's. Was not easy to distinguish the size with unisex shoes
customer_reviews.author: josh heubi

customer_reviews.title: ... true to its picture it looks and feels absolutely great but im a little bit concerned with the flimsyness ...
customer_reviews.text: the shoe is true to its picture it looks and feels absolutely great but im a little bit concerned with the flimsyness off the show
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these Vans and I really love that I can get them on Amazon instead of searching for my size at the department stores!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Really liked by the wearer
customer_reviews.text: My special needs sister loves the fit and color of this shoe! It’s her third pair and the only shoe she wears.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves them! Running around a huge university campus, just what she needed!
customer_reviews.author: My Paycheck goes to Amazon

customer_reviews.title: ... other off brand's out there but no shoe's fit like a pair of Van's
customer_reviews.text: There's other off brand's out there but no shoe's fit like a pair of Van's. Or last as long.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Use these for my everyday work shoes. I walk ...
customer_reviews.text: Use these for my everyday work shoes. I walk over 15,000 steps a day in these shoes and they hold up very well. I have replaced the insoles but other than that no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for a flatter shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for a flatter shoe. I wear them a lot. I have a wide foot and the wide size fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great Everyday Show
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to wash - great for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: I like the color and I know she will love them
customer_reviews.text: I got the Vans shoes on time for my Granddaughter Christmas gift, I like the color and I know she will love them, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: George G.

customer_reviews.title: too big and sloppy in fit. Followed fit guide ...
customer_reviews.text: too big and sloppy in fit. Followed fit guide and ordered a size 9. Wish I ordered 8.5 as I normally would have done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great casual footwear
customer_reviews.text: Authentic Vans. Looks great. I dislike bulky shoes so these fit perfect! I bought size 8 for women.
customer_reviews.author: Konmari

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: Great fit same size 7 I take in all shoes. These black Vans look young and go with shorts, jeans, capris, everything.
customer_reviews.author: Josette DuPres

customer_reviews.title: Quality and durability is not great.
customer_reviews.text: The rubber detached from the fabric after wearing them two times for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Bischoff

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Confort
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, the fit and they are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: J Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable & cute authentic Vans. They fit great, & didn’t need to be broken in. Wish I could wear them every day!
customer_reviews.author: ParisSunset

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They fit perfect and are great quality. They are real Vans and they came so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Joe olney

customer_reviews.title: VANS LAST FOREVER
customer_reviews.text: God, they're great. Stop thinking about it. You know you want them.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were exactly what my sister wanted for Christmas. :)
customer_reviews.author: Angelgurl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern. They fit as expected. They are my go to travel shoes!
customer_reviews.author: LWT

customer_reviews.title: Must have shoe option in your Van inventory
customer_reviews.text: Laughing that Vans are so in style again. Love these shoes and so does my daughter. She wears them EVERYWHERE!
customer_reviews.author: Todd C.

customer_reviews.title: Always buy vans shoes in your size or a size bigger, they are made to be tight on foot
customer_reviews.text: Vans are made tight to the foot which I love and these are exactly what I expected from Vans!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cool but they make my right pinkie toe hurt by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: M. Semler

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable! Love these shoes! Go VANS!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes. I hope they last another 10 years like my last pair!
customer_reviews.author: Kris P

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: The fit was too small but no great loss I gave them to my granddaughter. She loves them
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: They are simple and comfortable and last way longer than any other shoe I've ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to vans. They are simple and comfortable and last way longer than any other shoe I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: this shoe tore like after wearing it for 4-6 times. (i didn't skate or anything with it, heck I don't even run) I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS AT ALL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But these are great little sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Did not actually purchase the ones from Amazon, rather bought a similar pair, enough of a difference that Amazon one was returned. But these are great little sneakers. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Daisey Love

customer_reviews.title: YAY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my son and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica K.

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Hard insole some what large bought size 9 which is her normal size
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Still Going Strong
customer_reviews.text: As always, a great shoe. Tried and true. Been wearing them for years and VANS is still going strong after all these years!
customer_reviews.author: Nenalove❤️

customer_reviews.title: Classics
customer_reviews.text: Had these shoes for years. Happy they still make them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Svienty

customer_reviews.title: Can’t complain they feel and look great arrived on time with 0 issues can
customer_reviews.text: Can’t complain they feel and look great arrived on time with 0 issues can. I ordered a second pair for my fiancé the variety of colors are great!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: they are still fine and will keep
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be lower cut that my other Van's shoes, they are still fine and will keep them
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Vans are great just know they run a half size smaller than other sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Lastartz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these vans, so comfortable. i wear them every day
customer_reviews.author: Judith W.

customer_reviews.title: Three of my granddaughter's love vans! I have not asked the fourth if ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughter and she loves them. Three of my granddaughter's love vans! I have not asked the fourth if she wears them but I suspect that she does.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Sexy
customer_reviews.text: Some pretty sexy shoes. Can't go wrong with black on black.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: They fit true to size and look very nice! Definitely going to have to buy more in different colors :)
customer_reviews.author: Maria Cara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter reports that these take awhile to break in enough to wear everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect, they are comfortable and work great with everything.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: worth it!
customer_reviews.text: these are my go to sneakers! fit as expected and very comfy
customer_reviews.author: bean

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: They’re. Great. I wear them everyday. Takes some time to break in but no blisters or hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Jediny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Vans. True to size, with or without socks.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Not the best!
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t comfortable at all. Very stiff shoe, and heavy. I wouldn’t recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Thalita0217

customer_reviews.title: It’s sparkly!!!
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: this shoe is all pink sparkles, didn’t realize that at the time of purchase had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Laura McBride

customer_reviews.title: buy these.
customer_reviews.text: I love canvas shoes, and these fit perfectly and they rock.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Vans
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Always have. They're a neat and clean looking sneaker with a surprising amount of foot support. And when they get dirty, just throw them in the washer and leave them out in the sun to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with vans!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the all black Vans and they came in quick and in great condition. They look stylish and feel comfortable. You can wear them with pretty much anything and they will look good.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Love Vans products
customer_reviews.text: Not my first set of Vans, so was not surprise at all. Love Vans products:-)
customer_reviews.author: Lady P

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes.... Just ordered the wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly the shoes I wanted, I just ordered a 7 cause I always order men's in 7. These clearly say womens so it was my mistake. Easy return and I will be re-ordering the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi S.

customer_reviews.title: great sneaks
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of vans because I didn't want leather sneakers. These are great for work or just running to the market. Fit great and work REALLY well for me even without socks!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Courtemanche

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers. Have bought them before and wore them until holes appeared (several years).
customer_reviews.author: Milty Dolan

customer_reviews.title: ... barefoot for the first few times you will get bad blisters on your heel
customer_reviews.text: Definitely needs to be worn with a thin sick if you wear them barefoot for the first few times you will get bad blisters on your heel. Like the looks of the shoes though!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great Service A+
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived fast and just like the picture. Love them ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect comfortable closet staple
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Came in perfect condition and exactly as described. I have been a fan of Vans for a long time and these are a comfortable must have staple in my closet
customer_reviews.author: Kary

customer_reviews.title: The perfect canvas shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoe, but I ordered the wrong size. I returned the incorrect size and reordered the corrrect size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our son ordered these and wears them all the time ...
customer_reviews.text: Our son ordered these and wears them all the time. He hopes they last a longer time than some of the other shoes he's bought.
customer_reviews.author: Jody H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, just what I hope they be
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the professionalism of all the handlers who were involved
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has owned many pairs of Vans. Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes because they go with any casual outfit
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of white vans. I love these shoes because they go with any casual outfit. They do get dirty quickly so use shoe protectant.
customer_reviews.author: samantha brodsky

customer_reviews.title: Unique look
customer_reviews.text: Unique and rare, got complements from both women and men
customer_reviews.author: Amit Leibov

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: A tad tight but i think wear and tear will open it out.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Finally I can bring my feet to the 21st century ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally I can bring my feet to the 21st century with a touch of vintage flair. Before my feet were just plain. Now with my new vans shoes they have street style and cred. No more waiting behind the red ropes at the clubs. People stop n stare and even wink at my feet. My feet be poppin bottles. Thanks Vans
customer_reviews.author: Andeland

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10 and ordered a 9.5. They are comfortable and feels great
customer_reviews.author: Justme77

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my niece she loved them alot .
customer_reviews.author: Efrain febos

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These take a VERY long time to get broke in. They leave blisters until than.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey R. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I hoped for, comes in a nice van box. Saves me a trip to the mall! These are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: cute sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Like the sneaker, although it runs a little large but not enough to get the 6.5. I put a extra insert in the sneaker and it is fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Book Snob
